name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Lord
desc:
Future ruler of Medeas.
Has a long way to go.

name: Great Lord
desc:
Future ruler of Medeas.
Matured, but still has a lot to learn.

name: Draco Lord
desc:
Future ruler of Medeas.
A strong, charismatic leader.

name: Bow Lord
desc:
Crown prince of Fuegsol.
Master of the bow.

name: Draco Lord
desc:
Former heir to the Fuegsol throne.
A fearsome foe.

name: Dancer
desc:
Dancers whose dances revitalize their allies.
They cannot attack.

name: Bard
desc: Musicians whose melodies aid allies.

name: Trickster
desc: Masters of the performing arts and illusions.
icon_nid: Trickster (M) Sword T3 {Jj09, Scraiza, Sword of HaE}

name: Myrmidon
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Lightning-fast swordsmen of peerless and lethal skill.

name: Trueblade
desc: Peerless swordsmen whose total mastery of the blade fascinates all.

name: Mercenary
desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

name: Hero
desc: Seasoned veterans with remarkable skill.

name: Dread Fighter
desc: Mystic warriors with an exotic air.

name: Thief
desc: Experts in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Rogue
desc: Knaves who can steal even weapons off opponents' hands.

name: Ninja
desc: Trained spies under the command of Emperor Samegoro.

name: Assassin
desc: Masters of the killing arts.

name: Maid
desc:
A maid under the employ of
the Medean royal family.

name: War Cleric
desc:
A seasoned maid who heals with staves
and hurts with axes.

name: Feline
desc: A long-forgotten race of beast shifters.

name: Soldier
desc:
Average soldiers possessing
no special abilities.

name: Pikeman
desc: Inexperienced spearmen who use brutish tactics.

name: Halberdier
desc: Veteran frontliners who claim never to miss their target.

name: Sentinel
desc: Knights whose mastery of the lance are the stuff of legends.

name: Lancer
desc: Agile wielders of the lance.

name: Cavalier
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Paladin
desc: A title earned only by those cavaliers whose lives have been dedicated to justice.

name: Camel Rider
desc: Mounted warriors who are efficient in desert combat.

name: Mage Knight
desc: Knights trained in light weaponry and various types of magic.

name: Great Knight
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Peg. Knight
desc: Knights who soar through the skies.

name: Falcoknight
desc: Veteran pegasus knights.

name: Sky Knight
desc: A seasoned warrior who excels in aerial combat.

name: Knight
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: General
desc: Knights of great skill.

name: Marshall
desc: Heavily armored warriors with superior defenses.

name: Templar
desc: Members of the clergy with martial prowess.

name: Fighter
desc:
Ruffians with great strength but
poor defense.

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Gladiator
desc: Mighty warriors feared for their great strength.

name: Pirate
desc: Mighty seafaring fighter.

name: Brigand
desc: Ruffians with a strong offense but poor defense.

name: Marauder
desc: Ruthless brigands who are proficient in horseback riding.

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Reaver
desc: Stalwarts of overwhelming brawn.

name: Archer
desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Ranger
desc: Fighters skilled in both sword and bow.

name: Monk
desc: Practicioners of holy magic.

name: Cleric
desc: Members of the clergy who wield sacred staves to aid allies.

name: Bishop
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Saint
desc: Enlightened clergy granted power over mighty light magic and staves.

name: Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics.

name: Battle Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics and blades.

name: Archsage
desc: An honorific bestowed upon the wisest of sages.

name: Spellsword
desc: Prodigies of both the ways of magic and swordsmanship.

name: Shaman
desc: Impulsive mages with a tenous grasp on their magic.

name: Druid
desc: War shaman capable of incredible feats of magic.

name: Sorceror
desc: Masters of the dark arts and staff utility.

name: Drake
desc: Ancient creature of a bygone era.

name: Troubadour
desc: Maidens who wield staves from horseback.

name: Valkyrie
desc: Battle maidens who wield both staves and magic.

name: Holy Knight
desc: A blessed knight versed in magic, staves, and martial weapons.

name: Wyvern Rider
desc: An elite warrior mounted on the back of a wyvern.

name: Wyvern Knight
desc: Wyvern riders who can pierce enemy defenses.

name: Wyvern Lord
desc: Lords who command the battlefield on their draconic mounts.

name: Griffon Rider
desc: Sky warriors in training who ride griffons.

name: Griffon Knight
desc: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on a griffon.

name: Arbalest
desc: A griffon rider who has mastered the art of aerial combat.

name: Merchant
desc: Experts in economic welfare.

name: Arms Master
desc: Prodigies in use of martial weapons.

name: Supplier
desc: Conveyors of goods and items.

name: Ballistician
desc: Long-ranged attackers with high defenses.

name: Artillerist
desc: Long-range fighters with even more defensive capabilities.

name: Catapulter
desc: Expert marksmen with heavy artillery.

name: Merchant
desc: Experts in economic welfare.

name: Bard
desc: Musicians whose melodies aid allies.

name: Avian
desc: A long-forgotten race of bird shifters.

name: Fleet
desc:
Warships that patrol the open seas.
They carry powerful ballistae.

name: Crate
desc: A crate full of supplies.

name: Cart
desc: A horse-drawn carriage.

name: Phantom
desc: A phantom summoned with dark magic.
